channel.title: Comments on: Cool looking WPF application on dnrTV

item.title: By: indyfromoz
item.dc:creator: indyfromoz
item.description:
A recent video on Channel 9 is a must-watch for everyone interested in a real-world LOB application. I have blogged about it here - http://indyfromoz.wordpress.com/2008/09/07/lawson-smart-office-a-wpf-line-of-business-application/
The video is available at http://channel9.msdn.com/shows/Continuum/LawsonSmartOffice/
Cheers, indyfromoz
item.content:encoded:
A recent video on Channel 9 is a must-watch for everyone interested in a real-world LOB application. I have blogged about it here – http://indyfromoz.wordpress.com/2008/09/07/lawson-smart-office-a-wpf-line-of-business-application/

The video is available at http://channel9.msdn.com/shows/Continuum/LawsonSmartOffice/

Cheers,
indyfromoz
